Description: Atlas ultimate gathers enemies for Odette's Swan Song devastating AOE damage
Franco hook into Eudora stun and burst for instant kill
Tigreal gathers enemies for Gusion to execute multiple targets
Johnson drives with Odette to surprise engage and wipe team
Angela shields and speeds up Fanny for safer assassinations
Angela protects and heals Miya allowing her to free hit in teamfights
Diggie's ultimate gives Fanny CC immunity to dive safely
Lolita shields Claude from pokes and projectiles in teamfights
Khufra disrupts Fanny's cable mobility and locks her down
Mathilda dashes with Fanny for faster rotations and kills
Double regen creates unkillable frontline that outlasts enemies
Rafaela slows and pokes for Layla to safely finish from distance
Carmilla links enemies so Cecilion's poke hits multiple targets
Hylos charges enemies into Valir's pushback creating kill zone
Akai rolls enemies together for Xavier's penetrating burst damage
Tigreal gathers for Cecilion to spam skills on grouped enemies
Minsi marks enemies for Wanwan to easily proc her ultimate
Baxia reduces healing + Estes sustain creates imbalanced teamfight
Grock walls trap enemies for Hayabusa to execute safely
Gatotkaca knocks up for Guinevere to chain with her jump combo
Atlas freezes enemies in Pharsa's ultimate damage zone
Khufra's S2 cancels Ling's wall mobility and locks him
Lolita blocks projectiles while Pharsa zones from backline
Diggie enables Wanwan to dive freely without fear of CC
Estes heals Fredrinn making him nearly unkillable frontline
